Text: With the exception of a very bad glitch on the 3rd track Merry Christmas Darling @ 2:14, which makes my iTunes jump to the next track, this is the best sounding and highest bitrate upload of this album.   It also has the text RNBxBeatz all over the place in the file name and tags.  So if you are wanting a clean version of this album it is still yet to come.
as of Monday, Nov 29th. that is.
